Name: MarineVerse Cup - Sailboat Racing
About the game: Try sailing Learn to sail in VR, race in iconic sailing locations, try & master various sailboats. We designed MarineVerse Cup for people who enjoy simulation games and want to test their skills in a competitive setting. eSports Sailing in VR MarineVerse Cup is a competitive VR sailing racing game, that is approachable, but authentic. Existing features Daily Race Practice with Leader-boards 'Real-time multiplayer racing' mode, including co-op mode . Cross-platform support, including Oculus Quest VR and non-VR mode. 3 boat types. ( Yacht, Dinghy and with Sailing Pass: Waszp ). League system. When you start, you are sailing in a 'Standard' league. If you win a Daily Race, you get access to 'Pro' league. Basic tutorials. Planned features See Early Access description. Feedback and support Support and community help - our chat server is Discord ( link in community section ) Please submit feedback and ideas at our feedback forum ( link in community section ) Base version & Sailing Pass Base version includes only basic features. Access to 'Waszp' boat requires a 'Sailing Pass'. MarineVerse account required In order to play, you will need MarineVerse account. MarineVerse account are currently invite only and you can request one here at MarineVerse website. New to sailing or looking to relax? If you want a proper introduction to sailing, try VR Regatta: /
